pages.title: Where to find
pages.text: There are impenetrable structures hidden deep underground in the Overworld in any biome. They seem to be built from an unbreakable stone.

pages.title: Entering
pages.text: The entrance seems to be blocked by a powerful forcefield. Whoever built those was kind enough to leave you clues, however! The hearts on the forcefield's sides seem to indicate you have to have Azure Dike active.
